casebody.data:
Donald Douglas EBY, Appellant,
v.
The STATE of Nevada, Respondent. No. 78931 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED JULY 05, 2019

Donald Douglas Eby

Attorney General/Carson City

Douglas County District Attorney/Minden

ORDER DISMISSING APPEAL

This is a pro se appeal from a district court order denying a motion to stay appeal. Ninth Judicial District Court, Douglas County; Thomas W. Gregory, Judge.

Because no statute or court rule permits an appeal from an order denying a motion to stay appeal, we lack jurisdiction. Castillo v. State , 106 Nev. 349, 352, 792 P.2d 1133, 1135 (1990). Accordingly, we

ORDER this appeal DISMISSED.
